titleStmt.title: The sinners acquittance. A checke to curiositie. The safest seruice Deliuered in three sermons at the court. By Iohn Denison Doctor of Diuinity, and one of his Maiesties chaplaines then in attendance.
titleStmt.author: Denison, John, d. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legatt, and are to be sold by Iohn Budge, at the signe of the Greene Dragon in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "A checke to curiosity; and The safest seruice" has separate title page dated 1624; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
